title: Ontario G1 Driving License Knowledge Test (Rules of the Road)｜2025

questions.question: At an intersection where is flashing amber (yellow) traffic light, you must:

options.A: Stop if making right turn
options.B: Continue at same speed
options.C: Stop if making left turn
